parameters.text:
=You are a data analyst connected to Bright Data MCP scraping tool.

Scrape CRM-like sales data from this public API:
{{ $json.URL }}

Treat each user as a sales lead. For each entry, extract and simulate the following fields:

{
"leadId": <use id>,
"rep": <use name>,
"stage": <use username as deal stage>,
"value": <convert address.zipcode to number and use as deal value>,
"status": <use company.name to randomly assign status as "open", "won", or "lost">
}

Then:

Calculate total number of leads

Total value of pipeline

Count of leads in each stage

Count of deals by status: open, won, lost

Identify top 3 reps based on simulated deal value

parameters.content:
# 🚀 Smart CRM Scraper & Pipeline Health Analyzer (n8n + Bright Data + Google Sheets)

This automation workflow is perfect for sales ops, marketers, analysts, or even founders who want to:

* 📥 Scrape sales pipeline data from CRM dashboards
* 📊 Get insights into reps, leads, and statuses
* 📁 Store it all in Google Sheets automatically — no copy/paste, no coding

Let’s break this into 3 simple sections 👇

---

🔷 SECTION 1: Start & Set Target
🧩 Combines these nodes:

* ⚡ Trigger: Start CRM Scraper
* 🔗 Set Source URL (CRM/JSONPlaceholder)

📌 What Happens Here?
This section is where your automation begins. You:

1. Manually run the workflow by clicking ▶️ “Execute Workflow”
2. Define the website or CRM source you want to scrape

Example:

* You paste a mock CRM URL (e.g. [https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com](https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com)) — but in a real scenario, it could be a Bright Data-accessible CRM dashboard.

✨ Benefits for Beginners:
✅ No coding — just click + paste a URL
✅ Easily swap out URLs for different CRM dashboards
✅ Full control over when scraping starts

🎯 Icons Summary:
⚡ Manual Start | 🔗 Source URL Setup

💡 Real-World Use:
Replace the URL with a live CRM performance dashboard hosted inside Bright Data’s mobile proxy network.

---

🤖 SECTION 2: AI Agent — Scrape + Analyze
🧩 Combines:

* 🤖 Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)

  * 🧠 AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)
  * 🌐 Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown)
  * 🧾 Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)

📌 What Happens Here?

This is the “thinking” part of the workflow.

1. 🧠 AI Brain: OpenAI understands the task. It generates instructions like:
    “Scrape rep names, stages, leads, health from this CRM dashboard as markdown.”

2. 🌐 Bright Data Tool: The MCP tool accesses the page invisibly (like a phone browser) and extracts pipeline data using its scrape\_as\_markdown tool.

3. 🧾 Structured Output Parser: Converts the scraped messy text into a structured JSON format like this:

```json
[
  {
    "rep": "Alice",
    "leads": 22,
    "stage": "Proposal",
    "status": "At Risk"
  },
  ...
]
```

✨ Benefits for Beginners:
✅ Zero scraping code
✅ Handles login-blocked or bot-protected CRMs via mobile proxies
✅ Clean data format — easy to use in Sheets or dashboards

🎯 Icons Summary:
🧠 OpenAI Logic | 🌐 Bright Data Scraper | 🧾 JSON Cleaner

💡 Real-World Use:
Scrape weekly CRM dashboards from tools like HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce (if routed via Bright Data), and turn them into structured performance data.

---

🟨 SECTION 3: Format & Store to Google Sheets
🧩 Combines:

* 🧩 Split Metrics for Sheet Rows
* 📊 Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)

📌 What Happens Here?

1. 🧩 Split JSON: This node breaks the final structured output into individual items (one per sales rep), so each one becomes a row in your spreadsheet.

2. 📊 Google Sheet Node: Adds each row into a connected Google Sheet — storing columns like:

| rep   | leads | stage     | status  |
| ----- | ----- | --------- | ------- |
| Alice | 22    | Proposal  | At Risk |
| Bob   | 17    | Qualified | Healthy |

✨ Benefits for Beginners:
✅ Saves all CRM data automatically — no manual data entry
✅ Compatible with Google Data Studio / Looker / Excel
✅ Great for sharing with managers or teams

🎯 Icons Summary:
🧩 JSON Splitter | 📊 Sheet Writer

💡 Real-World Use:
Use it for live pipeline visibility. Sync Sheets with dashboards or reporting tools, or use for daily monitoring via automations.

---

📦 Final Summary Table

| Step       | Node Name                                 | Purpose                                      |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| 1️⃣ Input  | ⚡ Trigger: Start CRM Scraper              | Manually trigger the workflow                |
|            | 🔗 Set Source URL (CRM/JSONPlaceholder)   | Define where to scrape the CRM data from     |
| 2️⃣ Agent  | 🤖 Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)  | Smart agent to analyze CRM                   |
|            | 🧠 AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)         | Creates scrape instructions                  |
|            | 🌐 Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown) | Executes scrape via MCP mobile network       |
|            | 🧾 Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)   | Converts scrape results into structured data |
| 3️⃣ Output | 🧩 Split Metrics for Sheet Rows           | Breaks each record into its own row          |
|            | 📊 Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)      | Saves data into Google Sheet row-by-row      |

🤖 SECTION 2: AI Agent — Scrape + Analyze
🧩 Combines:

* 🤖 Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)

  * 🧠 AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)
  * 🌐 Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown)
  * 🧾 Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)

📌 What Happens Here?

This is the “thinking” part of the workflow.

1. 🧠 AI Brain: OpenAI understands the task. It generates instructions like:
    “Scrape rep names, stages, leads, health from this CRM dashboard as markdown.”

2. 🌐 Bright Data Tool: The MCP tool accesses the page invisibly (like a phone browser) and extracts pipeline data using its scrape\_as\_markdown tool.

3. 🧾 Structured Output Parser: Converts the scraped messy text into a structured JSON format like this:

```json
[
  {
    "rep": "Alice",
    "leads": 22,
    "stage": "Proposal",
    "status": "At Risk"
  },
  ...
]
```

✨ Benefits for Beginners:
✅ Zero scraping code
✅ Handles login-blocked or bot-protected CRMs via mobile proxies
✅ Clean data format — easy to use in Sheets or dashboards

🎯 Icons Summary:
🧠 OpenAI Logic | 🌐 Bright Data Scraper | 🧾 JSON Cleaner

💡 Real-World Use:
Scrape weekly CRM dashboards from tools like HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce (if routed via Bright Data), and turn them into structured performance data.

🟨 SECTION 3: Format & Store to Google Sheets

* 📊 Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)

2. 📊 Google Sheet Node: Adds each row into a connected Google Sheet — storing columns like:

| rep   | leads | stage     | status  |
| ----- | ----- | --------- | ------- |
| Alice | 22    | Proposal  | At Risk |
| Bob   | 17    | Qualified | Healthy |

✨ Benefits for Beginners:
✅ Saves all CRM data automatically — no manual data entry
✅ Compatible with Google Data Studio / Looker / Excel
✅ Great for sharing with managers or teams

🎯 Icons Summary:
🧩 JSON Splitter | 📊 Sheet Writer

💡 Real-World Use:
Use it for live pipeline visibility. Sync Sheets with dashboards or reporting tools, or use for daily monitoring via automations.
